== Description ==
Retrieve list of WordPress theme features (aka, theme tags).

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_theme_feature_list() ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
None.

== Return Values ==
; (array) : Array of features keyed by category, with translations keyed by slug.
